Climate Change Health Protection and Promotion Act of 2017

A bill to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to develop a national strategic action plan and program to assist health professionals in preparing for and responding to the public health effects of climate change, and for other purposes.
Climate Change Health Protection and Promotion Act of 2017
